mapper.insert: insert into reward_receive_record (player_id, reward_type, receive_time, receive_mode, receive_amount, receive_number, continuity_login_day) values (#{playerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rewardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receiveNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{continuityLoginDay,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update reward_receive_record set player_id = #{playerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reward_type = #{rewardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receive_mode = #{receiveMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_amount = #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receive_number = #{receiveNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, continuity_login_day = #{continuityLoginDay,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, player_id, reward_type, receive_time, receive_mode, receive_amount, receive_number, continuity_login_day from reward_receive_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, player_id, reward_type, receive_time, receive_mode, receive_amount, receive_number, continuity_login_day from reward_receive_record order by id asc
